title: Acer launches new Chromebook Spin 714 and Chromebook Tab 510
content:
Acer has announced a couple of new Chromebook devices during its next@Acer event today. These include the new premium Acer Chromebook Spin 714 convertible, as well as the Acer Chromebook Tab 510, a rugged 10-inch tablet. The devices come hot on the heels of the Acer Chromebook Spin 514 announced last week, and both are

The post Acer launches new Chromebook Spin 714 and Chromebook Tab 510 appeared first on XDA.
description: Acer has announced a pair of new Chromebooks, the Chromebook Spin 714 and the Tab 510. They'll be available over the summer.
